channel.title: /317/ pk-server -vps hosted - target points system - oldschool - RuneRevolutions
channel.description:
[u]This is RuneRevolutions PK/ECONOMY Server! This server is perfect for the players that want to experience bossing, skilling and want to invest time in at pk and our great community. [/u] We are brand new server since December.
[u]What does RuneRevolution offer? [/u] We have an advanced developing team that brings amazing updates that constantly trumps content as full working pk with targets , login and set your stats and go pk.
There is also strong, supportive and carefully staffteam to help you each hour of the day with any problems you may haev whether they are ingame related, donation related or even personal. RuneRevolution also features an extensive and active forum where players can post suggestions to improve things and talk to orther members of the community and get to know eachorther.
i hope we see you ingame
[/img]://i1143.photobucket.com/albums/n631/ancientscape/mopar1_zpsdf3314e3.png][/img]
